name: @sifchain/evm
description: Sifchain's evm client sdk for Peggy contracts

scripts.codegen: rimraf src/eth-sdk/abis && rimraf src/generated && pnpm eth-sdk -p src/eth-sdk && npm pkg set private=true --json --prefix src/generated && pnpm prettier --write src/generated
scripts.build: rimraf build && pnpm tsc -m commonjs --outDir build/commonjs && pnpm tsc -m esnext --outDir build/module && cp -r src/generated build/module/generated && cp -r src/generated build/commonjs/generated
